agenda.description: SENATE NOTICE OF PUBLIC HEARING COMMITTEE: Natural Resources & Economic Development TIME & DATE: 9:00 AM, Wednesday, March 13, 2019 PLACE: E1.012 (Hearing Room) CHAIR: Senator Brian Birdwell SB 450 Powell Relating to the deadline for certain economic development corporations to file a certain report with the comptroller. SB 496 Perry Relating to factors the Texas Historical Commission considers in reviewing an application for a grant or loan through the historic courthouse preservation program. SB 532 Birdwell Relating to the licensure and registration of persons engaged in certain activities pertaining to compressed natural gas or liquefied natural gas containers and systems. SB 533 Birdwell Relating to the severance tax exemption for oil and gas produced from certain inactive wells. SB 925 Flores Relating to calculation of daily production for purposes of the oil and gas production tax credits for low-producing wells and leases. Public testimony will be limited to 3 minutes. If submitting written testimony, please provide 15 copies to the committee clerk with your name on each copy.
